channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for HI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for HI

item.title: Report I-2023060017
item.description:
Report I-2023060017

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-14T00:31:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-04-21
  • City: LIHUE
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED AIRLINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: CALLER IS MAKING A REPORT INVOLVING A CIGARETTE VAPE PEN THAT BECAME HOT AND WAS PUT INTO A THERMAL CONTAINMENT BAG WHILE ONBOARD A FLIGHT FROM DENVER, CO TO LIHUE, HI (OVER THE PACIFIC OCEAN).
